tags: Chocolate and sugars and sweeteners and confectionary products
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

####  **Contract Reference Number:** WS4202392854-Doc4202473101

**Amendment 5**: Request for Standing Offer for Goods and Services.
 
**Contract Description**: The Canadian Government is soliciting bids for Goods and Services under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), and Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP). Bidders can submit their offers for any of the products listed under the UNSPSC.

**Selection Criteria**: The Contract will be awarded to the Bidder who submits the lowest price in accordance with the selection criteria set by the Procurement Category.

**Notice**: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time, for this tender. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by November 30, 2023, at 13:00 Eastern Time (ET) (Noon EST). Any bid submitted after 13:00 ET (Noon EST) will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.

**Tender Deadline:** 
The tender deadline for responding is 2023-11-30T13:00:00 with competitive bidding.

**End-User Entities:** 
Corrections Services Canada (CSC)

**Procurement Categories:**
- Nuts and seeds  
- Meat and poultry products  
- Seafood    - Dairy products and eggs  
- Edible oils and fats  
- Chocolate and sugars and sweeteners and confectionary products  
- Seasonings and preservatives   
- Bread and bakery products  
- Prepared and preserved foods  
- Beverages  
- Cereal and pulse products  
- Fresh Fruits  
- Frozen Fruits
- Fresh vegetables - Frozen vegetables 

**Trade Agreements:**
Government of Canada uses trade agreements to meet the needs of Canadian businesses and export industries. The main trade agreements used in the provision of this Contract include Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, and World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA).

**Regions of Delivery:**
The goods will be delivered in the following regions: Alberta, Saskatchewan, and Manitoba.

**Contracting Entity:** 
Departments of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

**Procurement Category:** 
Good and Service.

**Notice URL:**
https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx
